site_name: Wood Street Library, 750 Forest Road, Walthamstow, London, E17 4AA
description: Non Material Amendment under planning permission reference 210250 granted 1st October 2021 to allow minor amendments to the wording of conditions 2 (drawings and documents), 5 (Construction Logistics Plan and inclusion of a subsection of the condition requiring a separate Delivery and Servicing Plan),Â  9 (trigger for submission of details of electric charging points), 16 (Noise Impact Assessment), 19 (trigger for submission of Landscape Management Plan), 29 (trigger for submission of water use details), 39 (specifications of wheelchair accessible units) and 41 (trigger for Management and Maintenance Plan for the Families and Homes Hub) to reflect the sequence of the construction of the development and its phasing.
